0.body: ネットワーク検証環境で便利に使えるDockerfileを使用方法と共に集めました
0.title: About this repository

1.body: dockerとdocker-composeをインストールしてください。CentOSの使用を推奨します。 Install docker Install docker-compose このリポジトリを使用します。 https://github.com/kokuryom/dockers
1.title: Getting started

10.body:
$ su -
$ yum install -y freeradius freeradius-utils
$ cd /etc/raddb
$ mv clients.conf clients.conf.org
$ mv users users.org
10.title: Install

11.title: RADIUSクライアントを登録

12.body:
/etc/raddb/users # username: v2000, password: v2000pass
# will be assigned vlan-id 2000 on Access-Accept
v2000 Cleartext-Password := "v2000pass" Tunnel-Type = VLAN, Tunnel-Medium-Type = IEEE-802, Tunnel-Private-Group-Id = 2000
12.title: ユーザーを登録

13.body:
$ systemctl disable radiusd
$ systemctl stop radiusd
$ radiusd -X
13.breadcrumbs: ログが出る状態で起動
13.title: ログが出る状態で起動

14.body:
$ radtest v2000 v2000pass 127.0.0.1 0 testing123
Sent Access-Request Id 181 from 0.0.0.0:47802 to 127.0.0.1:1812 length 75 User-Name = "v2000" User-Password = "v2000pass" NAS-IP-Address = 192.168.10.181 NAS-Port = 0 Message-Authenticator = 0x00 Cleartext-Password = "v2000pass"
Received Access-Accept Id 181 from 127.0.0.1:1812 to 0.0.0.0:0 length 38 Tunnel-Type:0 = VLAN Tunnel-Medium-Type:0 = IEEE-802 Tunnel-Private-Group-Id:0 = "2000"
14.breadcrumbs: 別ターミナルで確認コマンド
14.title: 別ターミナルで確認コマンド

18.body: file role conf/ntpd.conf 上位NTP Serverを設定します
18.title: Configuration

19.body:
listen on * server ntp.nict.jp
server ntp.jst.mfeed.ad.jp
19.title: conf/ntpd.conf

20.body:
起動後、ロガーを追記モードで起動します。 $ docker-compose up -d
$ docker-compose logs -f 数分後、clock is now syncedと表示されれば同期成功です 注意： インターネットに接続できないなどの理由で同期できないとNTP Serverとして動作を開始しません。 myntpd | reply from 133.243.238.243: offset -0.000437 delay 0.003680, next query 34s
myntpd | reply from 210.173.160.57: offset 0.000364 delay 0.003804, next query 33s
myntpd | clock is now synced
myntpd | reply from 133.243.238.243: offset -0.000834 delay 0.003595, next query 32s 別ターミナルでntpctl.shを使用すると動作チェックができます。* が付いているレコードが同期していることを示します。 $ sh check.sh
peer wt tl st next poll offset delay jitter
133.243.238.243 ntp.nict.jp 1 10 1 1s 34s -0.753ms 3.702ms 0.780ms
210.173.160.57 ntp.jst.mfeed.ad.jp * 1 10 2 30s 33s 0.074ms 3.283ms 0.393ms
20.title: 起動

21.body: If docker network is non cluster settings, there are two methods to connect real network. host: attach to host nic with using host's ip macvlan: create macvlan network by docker network command, then attach to it with new ip address. If you use docker-compose.yml without the description of networks, host mode is used. (Though it may depend on docker-compose version). macvlan mode is very useful because it is isolated from docker host's network. This is great if attached vlan doesn't have internet access to build docker. Download from host's net, then deploy to favorite network. You can create new network rule with created network namespaces, ex. routes, iptables, forwarding and so on,
21.title: Docker Nertwork

22.body:
create macvlan network ex. v0100 is the name. docker network create -d macvlan --subnet=172.16.100.0/24 --gateway=172.16.100.254 -o parent=eth1.100 v0100 add networks to docker-compose.yml services: something: container_name: my-container ..... networks: v0100: ipv4_address: 172.16.100.5
networks: v0100: external: name: 'v0100' note You can not assign gateway address to container. If you specify --gateway at creating network, gateway has x.x.x.1 address and you can not assign .1 to container. you can change network namespace contents by scripts. #! /bin/sh
CONT_ID=`docker ps -q -f name=my-container$`
CONT_NS=NS_MINE
# initialize netns if nothing
sudo ip netns add testing
sudo ip netns del testing
# delete previous netns
sudo ip netns del $CONT_NS
# name netns as CONT_NS
sudo ln -s /proc/`docker inspect ${CONT_ID} --format '{{.State.Pid}}'`/ns/net /var/run/netns/${CONT_NS}
# change default route and add routes
sudo ip netns exec $CONT_NS ip r d default
sudo ip netns exec $CONT_NS ip r a default via 172.16.100.1
sudo ip netns exec $CONT_NS ip r a 10.30.0.0/24 via 172.16.100.254
# you can run iptables rule
sudo ip netns exec $CONT_NS sh ./iptables.sh
22.title: basic macvlan usage

23.body:
docker-compose down
docker network rm v0100
23.title: delete

3.body: Dockerfile docker-compose.yml check.sh conf users clients.conf
3.title: dockers/alpine-freeradius

4.body:
file role conf/clients.conf RADIUS Clientsを設定します conf/users ユーザーを設定します conf/clients.conf # localhost
client localhost { ipaddr = 127.0.0.1 secret = testing123
}
# ip range
client 192.168.0.0/24 { secret = class_c
}
# ipaddr
client client1 { ipaddr = 192.168.1.1 secret = client1
} conf/users # username: v2000, password: v2000pass
# will be assigned vlan-id 2000 on Access-Accept
v2000 Cleartext-Password := "v2000pass" Tunnel-Type = VLAN, Tunnel-Medium-Type = IEEE-802, Tunnel-Private-Group-Id = 2000
4.title: Configuration

5.body:
起動後、ロガーを追記モードで起動します。 $ docker-compose up -d
$ docker-compose logs -f 別ターミナルでcheck.shを使用すると動作チェックができます。 $ sh check.sh
Sent Access-Request Id 181 from 0.0.0.0:47802 to 127.0.0.1:1812 length 75 User-Name = "v2000" User-Password = "v2000pass" NAS-IP-Address = 192.168.10.181 NAS-Port = 0 Message-Authenticator = 0x00 Cleartext-Password = "v2000pass"
Received Access-Accept Id 181 from 127.0.0.1:1812 to 0.0.0.0:0 length 38 Tunnel-Type:0 = VLAN Tunnel-Medium-Type:0 = IEEE-802 Tunnel-Private-Group-Id:0 = "2000"
5.title: 起動

6.body:
必要に応じてFirewallの設定を行ってください。 su -
firewall-cmd --add-service=radius
firewall-cmd --add-service=radius --permanent
firewall-cmd --list-all
6.title: Firewalld

7.body:
alpineで構成するRADIUSはわずか数十MBのイメージサイズ $ docker images
REPOSITORY TAG IMAGE ID CREATED SIZE
alpine-freeradius latest 383c3d24fe5b 37 minutes ago 11MB
7.title: 参考情報

8.body: FreeRADIUS 3をCentOS7にインストールする参考情報です。 FreeRADIUSは以下の条件であれば簡単に用意出来ます。 数ユーザーしか登録しない 数RADIUSクライアントしか登録しない
8.title: FreeRADIUS 3 おさらい
